Title: PointCross Life Sciences - Generative AI/ML Architect - Python/PySpark
Skills: Generative AI, Machine Learning, ML Architect, NLP, Computer Vision, MLOps, Deep Learning, Data Science, Python, PySpark, Big Data

Job Description:
Job Description

We are looking for an experienced Generative AI Engineer with a deep understanding of Large Language Models (LLMs), prompt engineering, and fine-tuning techniques. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing cutting-edge AI models and ensuring their effective deployment to solve complex natural language processing (NLP) tasks. You will work with Chat completions, function calling, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and leverage OpenAI APIs to build scalable, high-performance AI solutions.

Key Responsibilities :

- Prompt Engineering : Design, develop, and optimize prompts for large language models (LLMs) to improve the accuracy, relevance, and coherence of AI-generated content.

- Fine-tuning Models : Fine-tune pre-trained models on specific datasets to enhance performance and adapt models to business-specific requirements.

- Understanding LLM Patterns : Analyze and understand LLM behavior and patterns to improve performance, reduce biases, and fine-tune responses.

- Chat Completions : Build and optimize systems for generating high-quality chat completions, ensuring context-aware and coherent conversational AI outputs.

- Function Calling : Implement function calling capabilities within LLMs to integrate AI-driven actions, such as querying databases, performing calculations, or interacting with APIs based on user inputs.

- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) : Integrate external knowledge sources (e.g., documents, databases) with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) methods to provide more accurate and contextually relevant AI-generated responses.

- OpenAI API Integration : Work extensively with OpenAI APIs (including GPT models) to develop, deploy, and optimize AI-driven solutions. Stay updated on new features and tools offered by OpenAI.

- Model Evaluation and Testing : Continuously evaluate and test models to ensure they are delivering high-quality results, addressing biases, and improving over time.

- Collaboration : Work closely with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and product teams to integrate AI solutions into end-user applications.

- Documentation and Best Practices : Create and maintain detailed documentation on model architectures, fine-tuning processes, and best practices for prompt engineering.

- AI Ethics and Safety : Ensure that AI models adhere to ethical guidelines and mitigate harmful biases, misinformation, and other risks associated with generative models.

Qualifications :

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or related field.

- 3+ years of hands-on experience with Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), and Natural Language Processing (NLP).

- Strong expertise in prompt engineering and techniques to optimize AI behavior and responses.

- Experience with fine-tuning and adapting pre-trained models to domain-specific tasks.

- Understanding of LLM behavior, common patterns, and how to improve model outputs.

- Familiarity with OpenAI APIs and tools such as GPT-3, GPT-4, and other OpenAI features.

- Experience in implementing retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques for enhanced AI performance.

- Hands-on experience with chat completions, function calling, and building AI-powered applications.

- Strong coding skills in Python, with experience using libraries like Hugging Face, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.

- Knowledge of data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation techniques.

- Strong problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills.

Preferred Skills :

- Experience with other generative models (e.g., T5, BERT, etc.).

- Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, and how to deploy LLMs on these platforms.

- Understanding of machine learning pipelines and model deployment strategies.

- Familiarity with model interpretability and techniques to improve the transparency of AI decisions.

- Experience with conversational AI platforms or chatbot frameworks.

- OpenAI certification or other relevant certifications is a plus.

Why Join Us?

- Work on innovative projects at the forefront of Generative AI and NLP.

- Collaborate with a talented team of engineers and data scientists in an innovative environment.

- Access to cutting-edge technology and resources.

- Competitive salary and benefits package.

- Opportunity to grow professionally and make a significant impact on the company's AI strategy.

Job Description:
Job Description :

We are looking for a highly skilled Generative AI Engineer to join our team and drive the development of innovative AI models and applications. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in Large Language Models (LLMs), with a focus on prompt engineering, fine-tuning, and grounding AI responses. You will be responsible for optimizing AI behavior, enabling chat completions, incorporating function calling, and utilizing retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to provide more accurate and context-aware responses. Additionally, familiarity with OpenAI APIs and its features is crucial for this role.

Key Responsibilities :

- Prompt Engineering & Fine-tuning : Design and optimize prompts to ensure high-quality, relevant, and contextually accurate outputs from Large Language Models (LLMs). Fine-tune pre-trained models for specific tasks or domains, ensuring grounding and relevance in responses.

- LLM Patterns & Understanding : Analyze the behavior of LLMs, identifying patterns and biases to improve performance and reduce undesired outcomes. Develop strategies for model adjustments to enhance coherence and accuracy.

- Chat Completions : Build and improve systems to generate seamless, context-aware chat completions for a variety of use cases, ensuring natural and engaging conversations.

- Function Calling Integration : Integrate function calling capabilities into LLMs, enabling models to trigger real-world actions (such as querying databases or triggering APIs) based on user input.

- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) : Implement and optimize RAG techniques to pull in external knowledge (such as documents, APIs, or databases) and incorporate it into generative AI responses for more accurate and informed answers.

- OpenAI API & Feature Integration : Leverage OpenAI APIs to develop, deploy, and maintain AI-powered applications. Stay updated on the latest OpenAI features and implement them effectively to enhance model capabilities.

- Model Evaluation & Testing : Continuously evaluate models, ensuring outputs meet quality standards and adhere to ethical guidelines. Perform A/B testing, debugging, and iterative improvements on fine-tuned models.

- Collaboration : Work alongside data scientists, machine learning engineers, and product teams to integrate AI-driven solutions and optimize user-facing applications.

- Documentation & Knowledge Sharing : Maintain comprehensive documentation on prompt engineering strategies, fine-tuning processes, and implementation guidelines. Share best practices with the team to enhance overall development efficiency.

- AI Ethics : Ensure AI models are developed and deployed ethically, reducing the risk of biases, harmful outputs, and ensuring safety and fairness.

Qualifications :

- Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.

- 3+ years of experience working with Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs).

- Proficiency in prompt engineering techniques and optimizing AI behavior and output.

- Experience with fine-tuning models on specific datasets or use cases.

- Deep understanding of LLM patterns, strengths, weaknesses, and how to manipulate their responses effectively.

- Hands-on experience with chat completions, function calling, and integrating external knowledge using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).

- Extensive experience working with OpenAI APIs (e.g., GPT-3, GPT-4) and integrating OpenAI features into applications.

- Strong proficiency in Python, with experience using libraries like Transformers, Hugging Face, and TensorFlow.

- Familiarity with NLP techniques and natural language processing pipelines.

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with an ability to troubleshoot and optimize AI models.

- Excellent communication skills for documenting processes and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Preferred Skills :

- Experience with other transformer models (e.g., T5, BERT).

- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for model deployment and scaling.

- Familiarity with containerization and deployment tools like Docker and Kubernetes.

- Understanding of AI ethics, model interpretability, and bias mitigation.

- Prior work in building conversational agents or chatbot frameworks is a plus.

- Experience with AI-driven applications in real-world environments.

Why Join Us?

- Work on groundbreaking projects at the intersection of AI, NLP, and Generative Models.

- Collaborate with an experienced team of AI engineers and data scientists.

- Access to the latest technologies and tools in the AI space.

- Competitive salary and benefits.

- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.

Title: Generative AI Engineer - LLM
Skills: Generative AI, Artificial Intelligence, LLM, Data Science, Python

Job Description:
Job Description :


Key Responsibilities :


Model Development and Training : Design, develop, and fine-tune advanced generative AI models, such as large language models (LLMs) and other neural network architectures. Train models on massive datasets to improve their ability to generate high-quality, relevant, and coherent content. Experiment with different model architectures, hyperparameters, and training techniques to optimize performance.


Prompt Engineering and Optimization : Craft effective prompts to guide model generation, ensuring desired outcomes and avoiding biases. Continuously refine prompting techniques to enhance the quality and relevance of generated content. Explore innovative prompting strategies to unlock new creative possibilities.


Agent Design and Integration : Design and implement intelligent agents capable of interacting with users, completing tasks, and making decisions autonomously. Integrate agents into various applications and platforms, enabling seamless user experiences. Optimize agent behavior to maximize efficiency and effectiveness.


Evaluation and Improvement : Develop robust evaluation metrics to assess model performance and agent behavior. Analyze model outputs and user feedback to identify areas for improvement. Iterate on models and agents to enhance their capabilities and address limitations.


Ethical Considerations : Adhere to ethical guidelines and principles in AI development and deployment. Mitigate biases and ensure fairness in model outputs. Consider the potential societal impact of AI and work towards responsible AI development.


Required Skills and Experience :


- Strong foundation in machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing (NLP).


- Proficiency in Python programming language and relevant libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face).

Job Description:
Job Description :


We are looking for a skilled Gen AI IoT Developer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing innovative solutions at the intersection of Generative AI and Internet of Things (IoT). You will work on designing, developing, and deploying AI-driven solutions for IoT systems that enhance automation, data analytics, and decision-making capabilities in real-time.


Key Responsibilities :


- Design and implement Generative AI models that can enhance IoT applications by generating insights, predictions, and automated actions based on IoT sensor data.


- Integrate large volumes of structured and unstructured data from IoT devices (sensors, actuators, etc.) into machine learning pipelines to generate actionable insights.


- Train machine learning models, particularly in generative AI, to process sensor data, detect anomalies, and generate responses or predictions.


- Implement real-time data processing and decision-making systems using generative models to drive automation in IoT environments (e.g., smart cities, smart manufacturing).


- Work closely with hardware engineers, data scientists, and cloud architects to integrate AI capabilities into IoT infrastructure.


- Develop and deploy generative AI models at the edge, enabling low-latency processing for IoT applications in real-time.


- Work on the implementation of AI-driven solutions for managing, configuring, and monitoring IoT devices remotely.


- Ensure that AI models for IoT devices are scalable, resource-efficient, and capable of running on low-power IoT devices where applicable.


- Design and implement AI solutions that are integrated with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) for IoT data collection, storage, and model deployment.


- Ensure data privacy and security in IoT applications, especially when handling sensitive or proprietary data from connected devices.


Qualifications :


- Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Data Science, or a related field.


- Certifications or courses related to AI, IoT, or Machine Learning are a plus.


- 6 - 9 years of experience in IoT development, with at least 2-3 years of experience working on Generative AI models in an IoT context.


- Hands-on experience in developing and deploying IoT solutions, with an emphasis on AI-driven data processing and analysis.


- Proven experience with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, and scikit-learn.


- Experience with Generative AI models (e.g., GANs, VAEs, Transformers) to enhance IoT systems.


- Expertise in IoT protocols and communication technologies (MQTT, CoAP, Zigbee, Bluetooth, etc.).


- Familiarity with IoT platforms like AWS IoT, Azure IoT Hub, Google Cloud IoT, or similar platforms.


- Strong programming skills in Python, C/C++, JavaScript, and Java.


- Familiarity with embedded systems programming, especially for IoT devices.


- Experience in deploying AI models on low-power IoT devices (e.g., using Raspberry Pi, NVIDIA Jetson, or similar platforms).


- Experience with edge AI tools such as OpenVINO, TensorFlow Lite, or NVIDIA DeepStream.


- Understanding of AI explainability and model interpretability techniques.

- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java, and experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Jupyter notebook).


- Solid understanding of deep learning architectures and frameworks.


- Experience with data pre-processing, feature engineering, and exploratory data analysis.

Job Description:

This role is positioned at the intersection of technology, business processes, and strategic business vision. As a Technology/Digital Transformation Specialist, you will play a key role in guiding the organization through its journey of modernizing and streamlining its operations and offerings through digital technology. You will be responsible for assessing current technological infrastructures and proposing innovative solutions that align with the company's strategic business goals.


This dynamic position requires a blend of analytical skills, technological expertise, and visionary thinking, and is ideal for someone passionate about driving change in fast-paced, technology-driven environments.


Key Responsibilities :

- Define the technology vision, roadmap, and provide recommendations on digital transformation strategies.

- Manage and optimize technology tools, platforms, and processes to ensure smooth workflows and high efficiency.

- Collaborate with various departments (LOBs, Finance, etc.) to implement digital transformation initiatives, manage dependencies, and ensure proper resource planning.

- Act as a technology evangelist, fostering awareness and understanding across internal teams.

- Build and lead a high-performing technology team with expertise in Gen AI, ML, and Data Engineering to deliver significant business value through automation, tool creation, and accelerators.

- Develop and implement technology solutions to digitize services, improve customer experiences, and drive internal and external service changes.

- Manage risks, opportunities, and dependencies across all ongoing transformation programs.

- Provide leadership to the technical team in executing the transformation roadmap.

- Stay updated on industry trends, and identify opportunities for new or improved products and solutions.

- Apply innovation management best practices like Design Thinking, Agile, UX Design, root cause analysis, and software development life cycle to solve complex challenges.

- Identify stakeholder needs, expectations, and priorities, and build strong relationships with both internal teams and external partners.

Required Skills and Qualifications :


- Master's degree in Data Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

- 12-15 years of experience in software engineering with prior product management experience.

- Proven track record of leading product, GenAI/ML projects from inception to deployment, with at least 8 years in a managerial or leadership role.

- Experience in managing the entire product lifecycle, from concept to launch.

- Deep knowledge of design patterns, standards, and best practices for machine learning model development.

- Extensive experience in server-side web development, middleware, Enterprise Application Platforms (EAPs), and scripting tools/protocols.

- Strong leadership skills with the ability to influence and drive alignment across teams.

- Excellent communication skills and a demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

- Self-motivated and capable of thriving in environments with ambiguous requirements.

- Experience working with data scientists to create and refine AI model prompts.

- Expertise in developing advanced prompt engineering techniques to improve GenAI model performance and accuracy.

- Strong problem-solving and prioritization skills.

- Ability to work effectively in a cross-functional, collaborative environment.

Preferred Qualifications :

- Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools (CI/CD, containerization, etc.).

- Experience with microservices architecture.

- Knowledge of distributed systems and cloud-native applications.

Why Join Us?

- Join a collaborative and innovative team that values creative problem-solving.

- Enjoy opportunities for career growth and professional development.

- Work on cutting-edge technologies and challenging projects.

- Competitive compensation and benefits package.

If you are passionate about driving innovation, leading engineering teams, and delivering high-quality solutions, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Job Description:
About Infogain :

Infogain is a human-centered digital platform and software engineering company based out of Silicon Valley. We engineer business outcomes for Fortune 500 companies and digital natives in the technology, healthcare, insurance, travel, telecom, and retail & CPG industries using technologies such as cloud, microservices, automation, IoT, and artificial intelligence.


We accelerate experience-led transformation in the delivery of digital platforms. Infogain is also a Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) Gold Partner and Azure Expert Managed Services Provider (MSP).Infogain, an Apax Funds portfolio company, has offices in California, Washington, Texas, the UK, the UAE, and Singapore, with delivery centers in Seattle, Houston, Austin, Krakw, Noida, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Pune, and Bengaluru.

Infogain is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Job Summary :

Infogain is seeking a motivated and innovative Data Scientist with a specialization in Generative AI. The ideal candidate will be enthusiastic about exploring new problems, driving innovation, and leveraging advanced machine learning techniques and programming skills (especially in Python). You will assist in enhancing the analytics backend of our flagship products and contribute to advancing our knowledge discovery solutions. This role is perfect for someone who enjoys learning, creative problem-solving, and working in a dynamic environment.

Eligibility :

Minimum Qualifications :

- Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field OR master's degree in statistics, economics, business economics, econometrics, or operations research.

- 7-10 years of experience in the Analytics/Data Science domain.

- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python.

- Experience with Generative AI techniques and tools.

- Familiarity with ETL methods, data imputation, data cleaning, and outlier handling.

- Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and AI/ML services.

- Knowledge of databases and associated tools such as SQL.

Technical Skills - Desirable :

- Expertise in NLP and Generative AI concepts/methods/techniques like

- Prompt design/engineering

- Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), Corrective RAG and Knowledge Graph-based RAG using GPT-4o

- Fine-tuning through LORA/QLORA

- Multi-agentic frameworks for RAG

- Reranker etc. for enhancing the plain-vanilla RAG

- Evaluation frameworks like G-Eval etc.

- Strong understanding of Deep Learning methods and Machine Learning techniques including Ensemble methods, Support Vector Machines, and Natural Language Processing (NLP).

- Exposure to Big Data technologies like Hadoop, Hive, Spark.

- Experience with advanced reporting tools such as Tableau, Qlikview, or PowerBI.

Specific Responsibilities :

Requirement Gathering :

- Translate business requirements into actionable analytical plans in collaboration with the team.

- Ensure alignment of analytical plans with the customer's strategic objectives.

Data Handling :

- Identify and leverage appropriate data sources to address business problems.

- Explore, diagnose, and resolve data discrepancies, including ETL tasks, missing values, and outliers.

Project Leadership and Execution :

- Individually lead projects, proof-of-concept (POC) initiatives, or development efforts from inception to completion.

- Contribute to the development and refinement of technical and analytics architecture, ensuring it aligns with project and organizational goals.

- Design and implement scalable and robust analytical frameworks and data pipelines to support advanced analytics and machine learning applications.

- Manage project timelines, resources, and deliverables, coordinating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals.

- Ensure the delivery of production-ready models and solutions, meeting quality and performance standards.

- Monitor success metrics to ensure high-quality output and make necessary adjustments.

- Create and maintain documentation/reports.

Mentoring and Team Development :

- Mentor junior data scientists, providing guidance on technical challenges and career development.

- Facilitate knowledge sharing within the team, promoting best practices and fostering a collaborative environment.

- Conduct code reviews to ensure high-quality, maintainable, and efficient code.

Innovation and Best Practices :

- Stay informed about new trends in Generative AI and integrate relevant advancements into our solutions.

- Implement novel applications of Generative AI algorithms and techniques in Python.

- Evaluate and adopt best practices in AI/ML development to enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of our solutions.

Title : LLM Ops Engineer

Location : Noida

Experience : 11-15 Years

Description & Requirements :

Position Summary :

- LLMOps(Large language model operations) Engineer will play a pivotal role in building and maintaining the infrastructure and pipelines for our cutting-edge Generative AI applications, establishing efficient and scalable systems for LLM research, evaluation, training, and fine-tuning.


- Engineer will be responsible for managing and optimizing large language models (LLMs) across various platforms.


- This position is uniquely tailored for those who excel in crafting pipelines, cloud infrastructure, environments, and workflows.


- Your expertise in automating and streamlining the ML lifecycle will be instrumental in ensuring the efficiency, scalability, and reliability of our Generative AI models and associated platform.


- LLMOps engineer's expertise will ensure the smooth deployment, maintenance, and performance of these AI platforms and powerful large language models.

- You will follow Site Reliability Engineering & MLOps principles and will be encouraged to contribute your own best practices and ideas to our ways of working.

- Reporting to the Head of Cloud Native operations, you will be an experienced thought leader, and comfortable engaging senior managers and technologists. You will engage with clients, display technical leadership, and guide the creation of efficient and complex products/solutions.

Key Responsibilities :

Technical & Architectural Leadership :

- Contribute to the technical delivery of projects, ensuring a high quality of work that adheres to best practices, brings innovative approaches and meets client expectations. Project types include following (but not limited to) :

- Solution architecture, Proof of concepts (PoCs), MVP, design, develop, and implementation of ML/LLM pipelines for generative AI models, encompassing data ingestion, pre-processing, training, deployment, and monitoring.

- Automate ML tasks across the model lifecycle.

- Contribute to thought leadership across the Cloud Native domain with an expert understanding of advanced AI solutions using Large Language Models (LLM) & Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques and partner technologies.

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate LLM and NLP technologies into existing systems.

- Ensure the highest levels of security and compliance are maintained in all ML and LLM operations.

- Stay abreast of the latest developments in ML and LLM technologies and methodologies, integrating these innovations to enhance operational efficiency and model effectiveness.

- Collaborate with global peers from partner ecosystems on joint technical projects. This partner ecosystem includes Google, Microsoft, AWS, IBM, Red Hat, Intel, Cisco, and Dell / VMware etc.

Service Delivery :

- Provide a technical hands-on contribution. Create scalable infra to support enterprise loads (distributed GPU compute, foundation models, orchestrating across multiple cloud vendors, etc.)

- Ensuring the reliable and efficient platform operations.

- Apply data science, machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing methods to analyse, process, and improve the model's data and performance.

- Create and optimize prompts and queries for retrieval augmented generation and prompt engineering techniques to enhance the model's capabilities and user experience w.r.t Operations & associated platforms.

- Client-facing influence and guidance, engaging in consultative client discussions and performing a Trusted Advisor role.

- Provide effective support to Sales and Delivery teams.

- Support sales pursuits and enable revenue growth.

- Define the modernization strategy for client platform and associated IT practices, create solution architecture and provide oversight of the client journey.

Innovation & Initiative :

- Always maintain hands-on technical credibility, keep in front of the industry, and be prepared to show and lead the way forward to others.

- Engage in technical innovation and support position as an industry leader.

- Actively contribute to sponsorship of leading industry bodies such as the CNCF and Linux Foundation.

- Contribute to thought leadership by writing Whitepapers, blogs, and speaking at industry events.

- Be a trusted, knowledgeable internal innovator driving success across our global workforce.

Client Relationships :

- Advise on best practices related to platform & Operations engineering and cloud native operations, run client briefings and workshops, and engage technical leaders in a strategic dialogue.

- Develop and maintain strong relationships with client stakeholders.

- Perform a Trusted Advisor role.

- Contribute to technical projects with a strong focus on technical excellence and on-time delivery.

Mandatory Skills & Experience :

- Expertise in designing and optimizing machine-learning operations, with a preference for LLMOps.

- Proficient in Data Science, Machine Learning, Python, SQL, Linux/Unix shell scripting.

- Experience on Large Language Models and Natural Language Processing (NLP), and experience with researching, training, and fine-tuning LLMs. Contribute towards fine-tune Transformer models for optimal performance in NLP tasks, if required.

- Implement and maintain automated testing and deployment processes for machine learning models w.r.t LLMOps.

- Implement version control, CI/CD pipelines, and containerization techniques to streamline ML and LLM workflows.

- Develop and maintain robust monitoring and alerting systems for generative AI models ensuring proactive identification and resolution of issues.

- Research or engineering experience in deep learning with one or more of the following : generative models, segmentation, object detection, classification, model optimisations.

- Experience implementing RAG frameworks as part of available-ready products.

- Experience in setting up the infrastructure for the latest technology such as Kubernetes, Serverless, Containers, Microservices etc.

- Experience in scripting / programming to automate deployments and testing, worked on tools like Terraform and Ansible. Scripting languages like Python, bash, YAML etc.

- Experience on CI/CD opensource and enterprise tool sets such as Argo CD, Jenkins (others like Jenkins X, Circle CI, Argo CD, Tekton, Travis, Concourse an advantage).

- Experience with the GitHub/DevOps Lifecycle

- Experience in Observability solutions (Prometheus, EFK stacks, ELK stacks, Grafana, Dynatrace, AppDynamics)

- Experience in at-least one of the clouds for example - Azure/AWS/GCP

- Significant experience on microservices-based, container-based or similar modern approaches of applications and workloads.

- You have exemplary verbal and written communication skills (English). Able to interact and influence at the highest level, you will be a confident presenter and speaker, able to command the respect of your audience.

Desired Skills & Experience :

- Bachelor level technical degree or equivalent experience; Computer Science, Data Science, or Engineering background preferred; Master's Degree desired.

- Experience in LLMOps or related areas, such as DevOps, data engineering, or ML infrastructure.

- Hands-on experience in deploying and managing machine learning and large language model pipelines in cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) for ML workloads.

- Familiar with data science, machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing concepts, tools, and libraries such as Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, NLTK etc.

- Experience in using retrieval augmented generation and prompt engineering techniques to improve the model's quality and diversity to improve operations efficiency. Proven experience in developing and fine-tuning Language Models (LLMs).

- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Generative AI, conduct research, and explore innovative techniques to improve model quality and efficiency.

- The perfect candidate will already be working within a System Integrator, Consulting or Enterprise organisation with 8+ years of experience in a technical role within the Cloud domain.

- Deep understanding of core practices including SRE, Agile, Scrum, XP and Domain Driven Design. Familiarity with the CNCF open-source community.

- Enjoy working in a fast-paced and dynamic environment using the latest technologies

Job Description:
Role : LLM Engineer

Position : FTE, remote, India

Availability-Immediate : 1 week

8 hours with IST(Indian Standard Time)

Candidate proficiency level : Senior(7+)

Job Description : LLM Engineer

Role Overview :


We are looking for a highly skilled LLM Engineer to design and develop a GenAI-based solution for automating the migration of RPA BOTs from UiPath/Automation Anywhere to ServiceNow RPA.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) and creating a system capable of interpreting and converting source XML files into ServiceNow RPA-compatible XML files.

This role requires a strong understanding of LLM algorithms, RPA systems, and automation workflows.

Key Responsibilities :


- Research, select, and fine-tune appropriate LLM algorithms to support XML-to-XML conversion for RPA migration.

- Develop and train LLMs using curated training data provided by the RPA development team.

- Design a robust pipeline for parsing source XML files and generating ServiceNow RPA-compatible XML outputs.

- Incorporate validation mechanisms within the LLM to ensure the correctness of converted BOTs.

- Work closely with RPA developers to iterate on feedback loops and improve the model's accuracy and reliability.

- Develop a mechanism for validating the LLM-converted BOTs and generating corrective feedback for further refinement.

- Optimize the solution for scalability and maintainability in enterprise environments. Document processes, methodologies, and performance metrics to ensure traceability and knowledge transfer.

Required Qualifications :


- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.

- Strong experience in building and fine-tuning LLMs using frameworks like HuggingFace.


- Familiarity with parsing and processing XML files programmatically.

- Proficiency in Python or other programming languages relevant for machine learning and data manipulation.

- Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to work in cross-functional teams.

- Excellent communication and documentation skills.

Preferred Skills :


- Experience with RPA platforms like UiPath, Automation Anywhere, or ServiceNow RPA is a plus.

- Knowledge of ServiceNow RPA architecture and components.

- Hands-on experience in building automated conversion tools.

- Familiarity with version control systems like Git and DevOps workflows.

- Knowledge of prompt engineering and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) techniques.

Job Description:

The ideal candidate will design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge solutions leveraging tools such as nltk, spaCy, and other modern NLP frameworks. Experience in prompt engineering for GenAI models (e.g., GPT, LLaMA) is crucial.

You will play a key role in solving business problems by building models, extracting insights from text data, and fine-tuning Generative AI solutions to deliver impactful results.

Key Responsibilities :

- Design and implement NLP models and pipelines for tasks such as text classification, sentiment analysis, named entity recognition (NER), text summarization, and topic modeling.

- Perform prompt engineering to maximize the performance of generative models for various applications (e.g., content generation, chatbot development, and question-answering systems).

- Preprocess and analyze large-scale unstructured text datasets to extract meaningful insights.

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, product managers, and software developers, to deploy AI/ML solutions in production.

- Design robust, scalable solutions using Python libraries such as nltk, spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers, PyTorch, or TensorFlow.

- Continuously research and experiment with emerging trends and state-of-the-art methods in NLP, LLMs, and Generative AI.

- Document processes, tools, and solutions while maintaining best practices for reproducibility and scalability.

Required Skills & Qualifications :

- Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.

- 3+ years of experience as a Data Scientist, with a focus on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Generative AI.

- Proficiency in Python programming and libraries/tools, including : nltk, spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers, Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch.

- Experience in prompt engineering and fine-tuning pre-trained models (e.g., GPT, BERT, T5, LLaMA).

- Strong understanding of NLP tasks: tokenization, embeddings, sentiment analysis, NER, summarization, etc.

- Familiarity with large language models (LLMs) and their practical deployment in real-world applications.

- Hands-on experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP is a plus.

- Proficiency with data visualization tools (e.g., Matplotlib, Seaborn) and understanding of data preprocessing techniques.

- Strong problem-solving skills, creativity, and analytical thinking.

Job Description :


We are seeking highly motivated and skilled professionals to join our team as Azure GenAI Solutions Engineers. The ideal candidates will have hands-on experience in designing and delivering successful Generative AI (GenAI) solutions and a strong understanding of Azure Cloud platforms, AI frameworks, and transformer-based architectures.

Key Responsibilities :


- Design, develop, and deliver innovative GenAI solutions to meet business needs.


- Leverage Azure Cloud Platform and Azure AI services, including Azure AI Search, Azure OpenAI, Document Intelligence, Speech, Vision, etc.

- Architect and implement solutions using Azure infrastructure and services.

- Work with OpenAI models, open-source LLMs, and GenAI frameworks like LangChain and Pandas.

- Apply advanced knowledge of Transformer/Neural Network architectures to GenAI applications.

- Build and optimize semantic and vector search solutions using Vector/Graph Databases.

- Write efficient, clean, and scalable code in Python.

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify, develop, and deploy AI-driven solutions.

- Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, GenAI technologies, and frameworks.

Key Requirements :


- Proven experience in delivering successful GenAI solutions.

- Proficiency in Azure Cloud Platform and Azure AI services.

- Hands-on experience with Azure infrastructure and AI solutioning.

- Familiarity with OpenAI Models, open-source LLMs, and frameworks like LangChain and Pandas.

- Strong understanding of Transformer/Neural Network architectures and their practical applications.

- Experience with Vector/Graph Databases and semantic/vector search implementations.

- Expert-level proficiency in Python programming.

- Relevant certifications, such as Microsoft Certified : Azure AI Engineer or Azure Solution Architect, are a plus.

- Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and critical-thinking abilities.

- Strong communication and collaboration skills to thrive in a team environment.

- Passion for innovation and pushing the boundaries of GenAI capabilities
Title: Azure Generative AI Solutions Engineer - OpenAI
Skills: Azure, Generative AI, Data Science, Data Scientist, Artificial Intelligence, LLM, OpenAI, Python

We are seeking a skilled and innovative Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in Large Language Models (LLMs) to join our team. The ideal candidate has hands-on experience developing, fine-tuning, and deploying LLMs, alongside a deep understanding of the machine learning lifecycle.

This role involves building scalable AI solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and contributing to cutting-edge AI initiatives.

Integration & Deployment :

Experience :

Data Engineering :

- Experience with ETL tools and platforms for efficient data preprocessing.

Problem Solving :

Job Description:

- 4+ years of experience in IT support, with at least 2+ years in AI/ML production support (L1/L2).

- Proven leadership experience managing offshore teams and handling critical production support tasks.

Technical Expertise :

Problem-Solving Skills : .

- Ability to manage high-priority incidents and coordinate with cross-functional teams effectively.

Communication :


- Strong written and verbal communication skills for reporting, updates, and collaboration with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Education :

Certifications :


- ITIL Certification (V3 or V4) or other relevant certifications in IT support and management would be an added advantage.

Job Description:
Job Description :


If you are interested in working on Applied AI/ ML solutions to deliver business impact with customer satisfaction - this role will be the right fit for you.

Responsibilities :

You will be working on creating applied AI products across risk and marketing, assets and liabilities within the bank. It will entail understanding business problem, data and then ideation, creation, usage, impact assessment and presentation to senior stakeholders.

We are looking for sound understanding of AI/ ML techniques, strong business acumen, ability to simplify complexity and navigate through large/ big data.

Qualifications :

- Masters in Computer Science, Mathematics or Machine Learning/AI related disciplines from Tier I colleges.


- PhD is preferred but not compulsory

- Proficiency in GenAI, deep learning, NLP, CV and ML frameworks, other AI disciplines

- 3-4 years hands-on code development experience and familiarity with the python scientific computing stacks, Linux and cloud computing environment

- Solid understanding of Probability, Statistics, Mathematics, ML and AI techniques

- Experience implementing machine learning algorithms or research papers from scratch

- Experience in project/ product management would be a plus

- Experience in Financial Sector would be a plus.

About the team :

- You will be part of AI Centre of Excellence within Digital Banking Unit of the bank.

- You will work in a fast paced environment where new ideas are encouraged. This will involve liaising with teams within Digital and those across the bank e.g. data engineers, data scientists, ML engineers, product managers and senior business stakeholders.

The mandate of the Digital Business Unit at IndusInd Bank is as follows :

- Building customer centric products with human centered design principles for retail Individual and micro, small and medium enterprise (MSME) customer segments

- Build innovative products and propositions backed with problem solving mindset to discover and solve latent needs of customers

- Build Embedded Finance (Banking as a Service) applications

- Ensure designs are highly available, highly modular, highly scalable and highly secure

- Drive digital business

The unit's objectives are three fold - (a) Drive better customer experience and engagement (b) transform existing lines of businesses and (c) build new digital only or banking as a service led digital business models.

Job Description:
About the job :


To provide the technical, functional and governance expertise of the Microsoft's Power Platform with focus on enhancing the performance, efficiency and capability of the Control Risks business. This role will provide advice and guidance to citizen developers as well as help in governance and application review for best practices in terms of security, cost and usage


The role requires strong communication to non-technical audience and the holder needs to be able to work at a strategic level as well as have hands on tactical and operational skills to define work and trouble shoot / resolve issues in an effective way

Requirements :


What You'll Do :


- Develop and govern the Power Platform development framework to facilitate 3rd party and internal 'champions' based development, delivery and ongoing maintenance of Power Apps for Control Risks in a controlled manner

- Work closely with the D365 Solution Architect and Technical Delivery Manager to oversee and govern the design and delivery of Power Platform initiatives.

- Ensure alignment to MS Dynamics product best practices, standards and supported configurations

- Ensure all Power Apps development is undertaken in accordance with the Power Platform development framework

- Develop low code & no code standards and patterns for Power Apps developers, including a robust governance model

- Provide advice and guidance (including governance) to the wider audience on the enhancements to the solutions as necessary

- Supporting others within DTS to deliver the message to help inspire the business through demonstrations of the possibilities of Power Platform and its wider capabilities / integration to meet Control Risks needs and strategic ambitions

- Explore the functionality of AI tools including Co Pilot and capture use cases within Control Risks and advise on the approach and implementation

- Advise the business/internal customers on best practices for Power Platform processes, user interface and architecture

- Outline and capture best practices on Power Platform environments and rationalisation including administration

- Drive innovation and assist in the development of solutions that improve the efficiency and capability of Power Platform users

- Work with other teams on ad hoc projects as a SME utilisation resource from the Enterprise Apps team to complete project tasks on time and within budget


- Assist in major platform releases (upgrades) with regression testing and work with the business to arrange functional tests

- Provide support as necessary/relevant

- Resolve tickets and issues raised by Business Teams in accordance with internal service levels, processes, and procedures (L3/L4 Support)

- Help and provide guidance with training SMEs in areas specific to their BAU activities

- Work with the business SME's, help with knowledge, answer questions, drive a knowledge base, and sign-post appropriate training to support upskilling

- Help with D365-CE initiatives including design, configuration and enhancements

Who You are :


- 3+ years of development and extensions using the Power Platform: Canvas driven Apps, Model driven Apps, Flow, Power Virtual Agent, Dataverse & SharePoint based solutions

- Experience on D365-Customer Engagement

- Bachelor's degree and 5+ years relevant work experience

- Proven experience in business analysis with organisations of various size and complexity is an advantage

- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills

- Business process mapping and optimisation: experience leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimisation strategies

- Good interpersonal skills, possessing the confidence to build relationships with all levels of stakeholder

Job Description:
Role : Data Analyst - II


As a Data Analyst at Capillary Technologies you will support a major loyalty program by gathering, analyzing, and interpreting data

and communicating your findings to stakeholders and the larger team.


Duties and Responsibilities :


- Collect, clean, and preprocess large and complex data sets from various sources.


- Build and deliver reporting on a weekly and monthly cadence.


- Develop statistical and predictive models to identify patterns and trends in data.


- Analyze data to identify insights and opportunities for business improvement.


- Communicate findings and recommendations to key stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.


- Use data visualization tools to communicate complex data in an easy-to-understand format.


- Contribute to overall design and roadmap of the data utilized by the program.


- Mentor new and junior team members on the data model and analytics as well as efficient

query building.


- Perform data profiling, quality assessments, and documentation to ensure data accuracy and integrity.


- Collaborate with members of the Consumer Insights team, our software engineers, and the client's data analyst to identify business needs and develop data-driven solutions to address them.


Skills and Abilities :


- 3-5 years of experience with relational databases


- Advanced skills in SQL and Python for optimizing complex queries and handling data from multiple sources.


- Strong Analytical and Problem Solving Skills.


- Innovative and self-motivated with passion to develop complex and scalable applications.


- Strong communication skills with the ability to explain methods and findings to client

stakeholders.


- Experience in ETL/DB management and dashboard development using Tableau, Power BI, Looker, or similar BI tools. (nice to have)


It has been brought to our attention that there have recently been instances of fraudulent job offers, purporting to be from Capillary Technologies. The individuals or organizations sending these false employment offers may pose as a Capillary Technologies recruiter or representative and request personal information, purchasing of equipment or funds to further the

recruitment process or offer paid training. Be advised that Capillary Technologies does not extend unsolicited employment offers.


Furthermore, Capillary Technologies does not charge prospective employees with fees or make requests for funding as a part of the recruitment process. We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants

AuxoAI seeking a skilled and experienced Power BI Specialist with 3-5 years of hands-on experience in developing and managing Business Intelligence (BI) solutions. As a Power BI Specialist, you will work closely with stakeholders to design, develop, and deploy interactive dashboards and reports, providing valuable insights and supporting data-driven decision-making processes. You should have a strong technical background in Power BI development, data modeling, and a deep understanding of business analytics.

Responsibilities :

- Design, develop, and implement Power BI reports, dashboards, and data visualizations based on business requirements.

- Create and maintain data models to ensure the accuracy and efficiency of reporting structures.

- Extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from various sources (databases, flat files, web services, etc.) into Power BI.

- Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand reporting requirements and deliver solutions that meet their needs.

- Optimize Power BI reports and dashboards for better performance and usability.

- Implement security measures such as row-level security (RLS) for reports and dashboards.

- Develop and deploy advanced DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) formulas for complex data modeling and analysis.

- Familiarity with SQL for data extraction and manipulation.

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.

- Experience with Power BI Service and Power BI Workspaces for publishing and sharing reports.

Qualifications :

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Analytics, or a related field.

- 4-5 years of experience in Power BI report development and dashboard creation.

- Strong proficiency in Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service.

- Experience in data modeling, including relationships, hierarchies, and DAX formulas.

- Expertise in Power Query for data transformation and ETL processes.

- Knowledge of business processes and ability to translate business needs into technical solutions.

- Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with business teams and IT professionals.

- Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Job Description:
Brief Description :


We are seeking an experienced and versatile Senior Full Stack Power Platform Developer to join our team. This role will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying end-to-end solutions using Microsoft Power Platform technologies (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages, Power BI) alongside .NET technologies.


This role will be a key contributor in building custom web applications, automating business processes, and creating sophisticated data solutions while providing leadership to the development team.

This role combines full-stack development skills with expertise in lowcode/no-code platforms, with a strong focus on integration and custom code where necessary.

Job Description :


- Designing, developing, and deploying custom solutions across the Power Platform, including Power Apps (Canvas and Model-Driven), Power Automate, Power Pages (HTML, JavaScript, and CSS), and Power BI.

- Writing custom scripts and code where necessary in Power Pages, including HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, to enhance the user experience and ensure functionality.

- Leveraging .NET technologies (i.e., ASP.NET, C#, Web API, MVC) to integrate Power Platform applications with external systems, APIs, and databases.

- Collaborating with business stakeholders to gather requirements and design solutions that meet business needs.

- Developing and alongside leading and mentoring junior developers and providing technical guidance to the development team.

- Implementing and managing scalable, secure, and performant data solutions using Microsoft Dataverse.

- Providing ongoing support, troubleshooting, and optimization for deployed applications and workflows.

- Managing existing solutions which are built on Microsoft Power Platform technologies (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages, Power BI).

- Working closely with the project management team in Agile or Scrum environments to manage project timelines and deliverables.

Job Specification (Education, training, and experience) :


- Bachelor / master's degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field.

- Proven experience in .NET development.

- Microsoft Power Platform certifications (i.e., PL-400: Microsoft Power Platform Developer, PL600 : MicrosoftPower Platform Solution Architect) are highly desirable.

- Certifications in .NET technologies (i.e., Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate, Microsoft Certified : .NET Developer) are a plus.

- Ongoing participation in relevant training programs and workshops for both Power Platform and.NET technologies.

- Minimum 6+ years of experience in full-stack development, with at least 4+ years of hands-on experience working with the Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Pages).

- Strong background in .NET technologies, including ASP.NET, C#, MVC, and Web API development.

- Experience integrating Power Platform applications with external systems, APIs, and databases.

- Proficiency in building custom websites using Power Pages, including scripting with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.

- Experience with Dataverse and managing complex data structures within the Power Platform.

- Familiarity with Agile or Scrum methodologies.

Competencies / Skills :


- Expertise in full-stack development using Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages, and Power BI.

- Hands-on experience with Power Pages development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and integration with the Power Platform.

- Proficiency in .NET technologies, including ASP.NET, MVC, Web API, and C#.

- Strong experience with Dataverse and building scalable data solutions for Power Platform.

- Experience in integrating Power Platform applications with .NET-based backend systems and third-party APIs.

- Knowledge of PowerShell and other automation tools for managing Power Platform environments.

- Familiarity with Azure services (i.e., Azure Functions, Logic Apps, API Management) to extend Power Platform solutions.

- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to design scalable, secure, and efficient solutions.

- Excellent communication skills to collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders.

- Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality, maintainable code.

- Strong ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.

- Capable of balancing priorities and ensuring that the development team meets deadlines while maintaining high standards.

LOCATION : India Hyderabad.

Job Description:
Job Title : Data Visualization Specialist - Capital Markets

Location : Bangalore

Experience Level : 3-5 years

Domain : Capital Markets / Financial Services

Job Summary :

We are looking for a passionate and experienced Data Visualization Specialist to join our team in the capital markets domain. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of financial data, capital market trends, and visualization tools. You will play a key role in designing, developing, and presenting data-driven insights to support investment decisions, market analysis, and risk management for our clients.

Key Responsibilities :

Data Visualization: Design and develop interactive dashboards, reports, and visualizations for capital markets data, including equities, commodities, forex, fixed income, and derivatives.

Data Analysis: Work with large datasets to perform financial analysis, trend analysis, and predictive modeling. Translate raw data into meaningful insights for senior leadership and clients.

Tool Proficiency: Utilize visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, QlikView, or similar to create user-friendly and impactful visualizations.

Stakeholder Collaboration: Collaborate closely with business analysts, financial analysts, and traders to understand requirements and deliver tailored visual insights on market movements, stock performances, and risk metrics.

Market Insights: Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide market insights that influence trading strategies, portfolio management, and investment decisions.

Financial Reporting: Automate financial reports and dashboards for ongoing market trends, regulatory compliance, and other business needs.

Data Integration: Integrate financial data from multiple sources such as market feeds, trading platforms, Bloomberg, Reuters, etc., into visualization tools.

Performance Optimization: Ensure that visualizations are performant, especially when dealing with high volumes of financial data.

Presentation and Communication: Present data-driven findings and trends clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring they understand key metrics that impact capital markets.

Technical Skills Required :

Data Visualization Tools : Expertise in Tableau, Power BI, or similar tools for building interactive and insightful dashboards.

Data Analytics & Processing : Strong skills in working with financial data (e.g., using Excel, SQL, Python, R, or Pandas for data processing and analysis).

Capital Markets Knowledge : Understanding of capital markets products (stocks, bonds, derivatives, forex, commodities) and financial instruments.

Scripting and Automation : Ability to automate data workflows, including extracting data from APIs and automating visualization/reporting pipelines.

Database Knowledge : Familiarity with relational databases (e.g., SQL Server, Oracle) and big data platforms.

Advanced Excel : Advanced Excel skills for data manipulation, modeling, and visualizations (pivot tables, charts, complex formulas).

Statistics : A good grasp of statistical analysis methods and how they apply to financial data.

Version Control : Experience with Git or similar tools for collaboration and version management.
Title: Data Visualization Specialist - Tableau/Power BI
Skills: Data Visualization, Data Analytics, Tableau, Power BI, Qlikview, SQL, Python, R, Pandas

Job Description:
Job Title: Lead Data Analyst


Company Name: House of EdTech


Role: Data Science & Analytics


Mode: Work from Home (WFH)


Location: Remote


Roles and Responsibilities


Data-Driven Insights: Analyze complex datasets across operational, marketing, and financial domains to uncover actionable trends and opportunities, directly influencing high-stakes business decisions.


Advanced Data Management: Leverage advanced capabilities in Google Sheets, Excel (formulas, macros, pivot tables), and MongoDB to efficiently manage, query, and interpret large datasets.


Strategic KPI Tracking: Define, monitor, and measure key performance indicators (KPIs) across multiple functions, ensuring data-driven evaluation of business and marketing initiatives.


Cross-Functional Coordination: Act as a central point of contact across departments, including marketing, operations, finance, sales, HR, and product, to streamline data-driven strategies and ensure cohesive decision-making.


Collaborative Leadership: Work closely with the founders and senior leadership, contributing to strategic planning and aligning analytics initiatives with organizational goals.


C-Suite Engagement: Play a critical role in the executive team, taking ownership of data-related deliverables that drive business growth and operational excellence.


Dashboard Development: Develop and maintain sophisticated dashboards using Power BI, Tableau, or similar tools to visualize data and communicate insights effectively to diverse stakeholders.


Proactive Problem-Solving: Anticipate business needs and provide timely data and insights to facilitate quick, informed decision-making.


Team Leadership: Lead and mentor a team of analysts, fostering collaboration and ensuring timely, high-quality analytical outputs across functions.


Business Enablement: Take charge of cross-functional responsibilities, ensuring alignment of analytical insights with company-wide objectives and enhancing overall organizational efficiency.


Eligibility Criteria


Must-Have Skills :


- Proficiency in Google Sheets and Excel (advanced formulas, macros, pivot tables).


- Expertise in MongoDB for managing and querying large datasets.


- Demonstrated leadership skills, with experience mentoring and managing a team.


- Proven ability to collaborate effectively with founders, senior leadership, and cross-functional teams.


Good-to-Have Skills :


- Knowledge of SQL for database management and analysis.


- Experience with visualization tools like Power BI, Tableau, or Google Data Studio.


- Familiarity with performance marketing tools like Google Ads and Facebook Ads.


Professional Background :


- Minimum of 5 years of experience in data analytics, including significant exposure to leadership roles

or project ownership.


Educational Qualification :


- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Data Analytics, Marketing, Computer Science, or a related field.


Why Join House of EdTech?


- Work with a fast-growing edtech leader at the forefront of innovation.


- Collaborate daily with the founders to drive strategic decisions and be part of the company's long-term vision.


- Enjoy the flexibility of remote work while working on high-impact AI-driven projects.


- Opportunity to shape AI-powered solutions for both internal use and external clients, driving significant impact in the edtech industry.

The successful candidate should possess a deep understanding of Microsoft Fabric components, including Synapse, Power BI, Data Factory, and Data Lake, as well as experience in integrating cloud-based data solutions with business processes.

This role requires collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative, high-performing, and cost-effective solutions that align with organizational goals.

- Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.

Note, this is NOT a management role.

Job Description:
Job Description :

We are seeking a Power BI Developer to build and maintain BI and analytics solutions that transform data into knowledge.

We want to meet you if you also have business understanding and problem-solving skills. You should have experience with data and business analysis to be considered. It would be best if you were analytical and a good communicator.

A Power BI developer is someone well-versed in Power BI technology. A Power BI developer is in charge of creating and managing BI tools and has a thorough understanding of the BI system.

A Power BI developer's primary responsibility is to transform raw data into relevant insights via interactive and simple-to-understand dashboards and reports. Because of his strategic, executive, and management roles and duties, a Power BI developer is critical to the firm.

Power BI Responsibilities :

  • Recognize business requirements in the context of BI and create data models to transform raw data into relevant insights
  • Using Power BI, create dashboards and interactive visual reports
  • Define key performance indicators (KPIs) with specific objectives and track them regularly
  • Analyze data and display it in reports to aid decision-making
  • Convert business needs into technical specifications and establish a timetable for job completion
  • Create, test, and deploy Power BI scripts, as well as execute efficient deep analysis
  • Use Power BI to run DAX queries and functions
  • Create charts and data documentation with explanations of algorithms, parameters, models, and relationships
  • Construct a data warehouse
  • Use SQL queries to get the best results
  • Make technological adjustments to current BI systems to improve their performance
  • For a better understanding of the data, use filters and visualizations
  • Analyze current ETL procedures to define and create new systems
Power BI Requirements & Skills :

  • Background with BI tools and systems such as Power BI, Tableau, and SAP
  • Prior experience in data-related tasks
  • Ability to transform the data to meaningful data using the Power Query and M-Query
  • Understanding of the Microsoft BI Stack
  • Mastery in data analytics
  • Should be proficient in software development
  • Be familiar with MS SQL Server BI Stack tools and technologies, such as SSRS and TSQL, Power Query, MDX, PowerBI, and DAX
  • Analytical thinking for converting data into relevant reports and graphics
  • Capable of enabling row-level data security
  • Knowledge of Power BI application security layer models
  • Ability to run DAX queries on Power BI desktop
  • Proficient in doing advanced-level computations on the data set
  • Excellent communication skills are required to communicate needs with client and internal teams successfully

Job Description:
Making a difference and driving positive change is what we do every day at Rapid Circle.

Our Cloud Pioneers help our clients in their digital transformation.

Are you someone who goes for constant, positive change? Then this vacancy is for you!.

As a Cloud Pioneer at Rapid Circle, you will work with our customers on different projects.

For example, making impact in the healthcare sector, by making research data safely available.

But also, awesome projects in the manufacturing or energy market make this job very challenging.

At Rapid Circle we are curious and are constantly improving our expertise to help customers find their way in a rapidly changing world.

We share our knowledge and discover new ways to learn.

Rapid Circle is growing rapidly and are therefore looking for the right person for the role.

You will be given lots of freedom to develop personally.

We also have a lot of in-house knowledge (MVPs) within the Netherlands, Australia, and India.

By working closely with your (international) colleagues, you can continue to challenge yourself and create your own growth path.

Freedom, entrepreneurship, and development are key at Rapid Circle, so also in the role of a Power platform Architect.

If you recognize yourself in this, then you might just become our new Power platform Expert!.

Job Description :

Key Responsibilities :

- Design & Development of Automation Solutions : Architect and develop robust automation solutions using Microsoft Power Platform, focusing on Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power BI to streamline business processes and improve operational efficiency.

- Power Automate Workflows : Design, implement, and manage both Desktop and Cloud flows in Power Automate to automate business processes, reducing manual intervention and increasing productivity.

- System Integration : Integrate Power Platform solutions with third-party systems, databases, and other Microsoft products (e.g, Dynamics 365, SharePoint, Azure) to ensure seamless data flow and synchronization.

- Collaboration with Stakeholders : Partner with business stakeholders to understand their pain points, recommend process improvements, and design solutions that align with business goals.

- Documentation : Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for all automation solutions, ensuring that they are well-understood and easily scalable by internal teams.

- End-User Support & Training : Provide ongoing support for end-users, resolve issues, and conduct training sessions to ensure smooth adoption and utilization of Power Platform solutions across the organization.

- Process Optimization : Continuously assess existing workflows and identify opportunities for automation and process optimization to reduce inefficiencies.

- Best Practices & Governance : Ensure that Power Platform solutions follow best practices for governance, security, and scalability. Provide guidance on implementation standards, coding practices, and deployment strategies.

- Problem-Solving : Use strong analytical and problem-solving skills to troubleshoot, debug, and resolve any issues in Power Platform solutions and workflows.

- Collaboration and Communication : Work closely with cross-functional teams, IT staff, and business users to design solutions, address challenges, and ensure alignment with organizational objectives. Provide clear, consistent communication regarding solution design, implementation, and status updates.

Experience :

- At least 10 years of professional experience in IT, with a focus on Power Platform technologies (Power Automate, Power Apps, Power BI).

- Proven experience as a Power Platform Architect or similar role, with a strong portfolio of successful automation solutions.

Technical Skills :

- Expertise in Power Automate (Desktop and Cloud flows), Power Apps, and Power BI.

- Experience with Azure and other Microsoft technologies (e.g, Dynamics 365, SharePoint, SQL Server).

- Strong understanding of REST APIs and experience with system integrations.

- Knowledge of Power Platform governance, security, and best practices.

- Familiarity with SQL, data modeling, and database integration with Power Platform.

Soft Skills :

- Excellent communication and collaboration skills; able to interact effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.

- Strong problem-solving abilities, with a strategic mindset and ability to think through complex challenges.

- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects with competing priorities.

Job Description:
Brief Description :

We are seeking an experienced and versatile Senior Full Stack Power Platform Developer to join our team. This role will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying end-to-end solutions using Microsoft Power Platform technologies (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages, Power BI) alongside .NET technologies.

This role will be a key contributor in building custom web applications, automating business processes, and creating sophisticated data solutions while providing leadership to the development team.

This role combines full-stack development skills with expertise in low- code/no-code platforms, with a strong focus on integration and custom code where necessary.

Job Description :

- Designing, developing, and deploying custom solutions across the Power Platform, including Power Apps (Canvas and Model-Driven), Power Automate, Power Pages (HTML, JavaScript, and CSS), and Power BI.

- Writing custom scripts and code where necessary in Power Pages, including HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, to enhance the user experience and ensure functionality.

- Leveraging .NET technologies (e.g. , ASP.NET, C#, Web API, MVC) to integrate Power Platform applications with external systems, APIs, and databases.

- Collaborating with business stakeholders to gather requirements and design solutions that meet business needs.

Job Description:
Who are we looking for :

AjnaLens is looking for a Sr. Signal & Power Integrity Engineer to join our Electronics R&D team at Thane (Maharashtra-India).

The position seeks highly-motivated individuals who enjoy working in a highly dynamic team environment. The successful candidate is able to demonstrate a broad skill set based on experience. We're looking for people who are intrinsically driven to solve hard problems with stunningly simple solutions, move fast, and are highly adaptive.

Top 3 Daily Tasks :

1. Design and simulate high-speed signal interfaces and power distribution networks (PDN) for advanced SoC packages, interfaces USB 3.0, MIPI CSI-2, MIPI DSI-2, LPDDR3 /LPDD4/LPDDR5, PCIe, & eMMC and PCBs.

2. Simulate, test and evaluate new designs to ensure compliance with Electronics specification requirements & prepare simulation reports.

3. Should be able to do Pre and Post layout SIPI analysis.

Minimum work experience is required :

- Bachelors or Master's Degree Engineering in Electronics/electrical, Physics, Mathematics.

- 5+ years of experience in SI/PI Background.

- Hands-on experience in Thermal simulation would be an advantage.

Top 5 Skills you should possess :

1. Strong knowledge in Signal Integrity and Power Integrity fundamental concepts. Deep understanding of electromagnetic and transmission line theory, general I/O design, timing budgets and jitter analysis expertise, signal integrity, S-parameter & its modelling concepts for differential and single-ended interface technologies.

2. Experience in designing, simulating signal and power integrity solutions for high-speed system components (packages, PCB, connectors & Interface).

3. Experience in design and analysis of high-speed single-ended or differential buses. Should be able to provide practical solutions to the PCB/Package design team based on simulation results and analysis.

4. Hands-on experience in handling electronic test equipment, Oscilloscope, Power Supply, Functional generator, Logic analyzer, VNA, signal generator, spectrum analyzer & Excellent hardware debugging/troubleshooting skill.

5. Strong knowledge in any one of the simulation tools like Hyperlynx, Flowtherm (system level), Sigrity (2.5D and 3D-EM Must) , Ansys SIwave and thermal Simulation would be an added advantage.

What would you be expected to do :

- Strive for data-driven decisions that are well understood and communicated throughout the team.

- Strives in a fast paced environment, adapts quickly to new requirements.

- Support in Pre-compliance tests (EMI,EMC, ESD).

- Development in new technologies AR/VR/MR products.
Title: Senior Signal & Power Integrity Engineer
Skills: Signal Integrity, Power Integrity, Power Distribution Network, SoC, PCI-e, PCB, PCB Design

Location : Bangalore

About the Role :

We are seeking highly motivated and skilled Power Management Firmware Engineers to join our team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge power management solutions. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining firmware for power management subsystems, ensuring optimal power efficiency and system performance.

Key Responsibilities :

Design, develop, and maintain firmware for power management subsystems, including :

a. BIOS power management features (e.g., ACPI, sleep/hibernate states, power profiles)

b. Platform power management (e.g., CPU/device power states, hot-plug, dynamic voltage and frequency scaling)

c. PCIe power management and link states

d. Analyze and debug power-related issues.

e. Optimize power consumption across the system.

- Collaborate with hardware and software engineers to ensure seamless system integration.

- Stay abreast of the latest power management technologies and industry standards.

- Contribute to the development and documentation of firmware specifications.

Required Skills :

Mandatory :

- Very strong in C language programming and debugging

- Working knowledge of git/gerrit

Key Skillsets :

- Good understanding and experience with BIOS, power management and PCIe

- Good knowledge SoC power management - CPU/Device power states, hot-plug etc

- Strong knowledge of UEFI BIOS, ACPI.

- AGESA knowledge is a big plus

- Experience with embedded systems development and debugging.

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Desired Skills (Optional) :

- Experience with assembly language programming.

- Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, Perl).

- Experience with Agile development methodologies.

- Experience with power measurement and analysis tools.
